questions.question: Explain the difference between SQL and NoSQL databases. When would you choose one over the other?
questions.follow_up: Can you give me a specific example from your experience where you chose one type and why?

questions.question: How do you handle error handling and logging in your applications?
questions.follow_up: What specific logging frameworks or tools have you used?

questions.question: Describe your experience with API design. What makes a good RESTful API?
questions.follow_up: How do you handle API versioning and backward compatibility?

questions.question: Explain how you would optimize a slow-performing database query.
questions.follow_up: What tools do you use to monitor and debug database performance?

questions.question: How do you ensure code quality in your development process?
questions.follow_up: What testing strategies do you implement?

questions.question: Describe your experience with microservices architecture.
questions.follow_up: What challenges have you faced when implementing microservices?

questions.question: Explain the bias-variance tradeoff in machine learning.
questions.follow_up: How do you detect and handle overfitting in your models?

questions.question: How do you handle missing data in your datasets?
questions.follow_up: What's your experience with different imputation techniques?

questions.question: Describe your approach to feature engineering.
questions.follow_up: Can you give an example of a creative feature you've engineered that improved model performance?

questions.question: How do you evaluate the performance of a classification model?
questions.follow_up: When would you use precision vs recall as your primary metric?

questions.question: Explain the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning.
questions.follow_up: Can you describe a project where you used unsupervised learning?

questions.question: How do you ensure your machine learning models are production-ready?
questions.follow_up: What monitoring strategies do you implement for deployed models?

questions.question: Tell me about a challenging project you worked on. What made it challenging and how did you overcome the obstacles?
questions.follow_up: What would you do differently if you had to do it again?

questions.question: Describe a time when you had to work with a difficult team member. How did you handle the situation?
questions.follow_up: What did you learn from that experience about team dynamics?

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to learn a new technology quickly for a project.
questions.follow_up: How do you typically approach learning new technologies or frameworks?

questions.question: Describe a situation where you had to make a decision with incomplete information.
questions.follow_up: How do you typically handle uncertainty in your work?

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you disagreed with your manager or team lead about a technical decision.
questions.follow_up: How do you handle technical disagreements in general?

questions.question: Describe a time when you had to mentor or help a junior colleague.
questions.follow_up: What strategies do you use to effectively share knowledge?

questions.question: Walk me through your most challenging project from start to finish.
questions.follow_up: What technologies did you choose and what influenced those decisions?

questions.question: How did you handle testing in this project?
questions.follow_up: What was your test coverage strategy and how did you measure quality?

questions.question: What was the most difficult technical decision you had to make in this project?
questions.follow_up: How did you evaluate the alternatives before making the decision?

questions.question: How did you ensure the scalability and performance of your solution?
questions.follow_up: What specific metrics did you use to monitor performance?

questions.question: Describe how you collaborated with other team members on this project.
questions.follow_up: What tools or processes did you use for collaboration?

questions.question: What was the biggest lesson you learned from this project?
questions.follow_up: How has this experience influenced your approach to new projects?
